Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game.

landscape.text1: Match Your Numbers to Winning Numbers and win the corresponding prize.
landscape.text2: {instantWin} Reveal a Diamond symbol to instantly win the corresponding prize.
landscape.text3: {instantWin10X} Reveal a 2x symbol to instantly win double the prize amount.

portrait.text1: Match Your Numbers to Winning Numbers and win the corresponding prize.
portrait.text2: {instantWin} Reveal a Diamond symbol to instantly win the corresponding prize.
portrait.text3: {instantWin10X} Reveal a 2x symbol to instantly win double the prize amount.

landscape.text1: {wheel} Reveal a Wheel Bonus symbol to trigger the Wheel Bonus.
landscape.text2:
WHEEL BONUS –  Press Spin to spin the wheel.
When the wheel stops, the pointer indicates the prize won on the inner wheel,
and the prize multiplier on the outer wheel.

portrait.text1: {wheel} Reveal a Wheel Bonus symbol to trigger the Wheel Bonus.
portrait.text2:
WHEEL BONUS –  Press Spin to spin the wheel.
When the wheel stops, the pointer indicates the prize won on the inner wheel,
and the prize multiplier on the outer wheel.

landscape.text1: {collect} Reveal a Prize Bonus symbol to trigger the Prize Bonus.
landscape.text2:
PRIZE BONUS - Select a Money Bag to reveal prizes. Prizes accumulate in the Total Bonus Win meter.
Reveal COLLECT to end the bonus and collect the prizes.

portrait.text1:
{collect} Reveal a Prize Bonus symbol to trigger
the Prize Bonus.
portrait.text2:
PRIZE BONUS - Select a Money Bag to reveal prizes. Prizes accumulate in the Total Bonus Win meter.
Reveal COLLECT to end the bonus and collect the prizes.

Game.bonusInfo: FIND 3 OR MORE GOLD STARS TO WIN!
Game.collectBonusInfo:
REVEAL COLLECT TO END
THE BONUS & COLLECT
YOUR PRIZE!
